title: [Spoiler] Avant Garde vs Sudden Fear / OPL 2015 Split 2 - W7D2 / Post-Match Discussion
body:
http://oce.lolesports.com/sites/default/files/OPL%20logo.png

[OCE MATCH VODS](http://oce.lolesports.com/vods)


AV | [eSportspedia](http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/Avant_Garde) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/avantgaming) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AvantGaming) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/AVANTCINEMA)
SF | [eSportspedia](http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/Sudden_Fear) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/TeamSuddenFear) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TeamSuddenFear)

****MATCH 1/1: AV (Blue) vs SF (Red)**

**Winner:**AV
**Game Time:** 38:07

**BANS**

**AV**
{{champion:268}} Azir
{{champion:126}} Jayce
{{champion:429}} Kalista

**SF**
{{champion:81}} Ezreal 
{{champion:25}} Morgana
{{champion:8}} Vladimir

**AV**

| Towers: 7  ---------- |Gold : 64.7 k ----------- ||Kills: 16  |
| :------------------------| |:-----------------:| |:------------:|
| Porky               | Shen   |  | 0-2-12 |
| Chelby             | Rek'sai     | | 4-4-7 |
| Kensie           | Victor       | | 4-2-3 |
| Warble               | Vayne           | | 8-0-3  |
| Destiny            | Janna     || 0-1-9 |

**SF**

| Towers: 5  ---------- |Gold : 55.2k ----------- ||Kills: 9 |
| :------------------------| |:-----------------:| |:------------:|
| Robosanta           | Maokai       |  | 0-4-8 |
| Apink bomi2           | Leesin     | | 4-2-4 |
| ChrisMistrees     | Cassiopeia          | | 2-4-2 |
| Energizer               | Sivir           | | 2-4-4  |
| Patu                       | Alistar     || 1-2-5 |

replies.body:
Really shaking early game for AV (due to the high dmg early game Lee-sin, but once again, Vayne and Victor has proven secure CS adv to be more important than the kills and lead the game in the mid-late game once again.
AV's team fight is well organized and played. but most importangly A fed Vayne is really really untouchable.

The play at baron was a really solid decision. vayne was able to get cass and drop alot of dps before the fight even really began.

the vayne was just disgusting.
